Class UnassignedMarblesController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers.SubSceneController
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers.UnassignedMarblesController
public class UnassignedMarblesController extends SubSceneController
Represents the unassigned marbles picked from the marketplace
